abstract: Rio Tinto and Mitsubishi have raised their offer to acquire all of Coal and Allied to about $131 a share, from $128, in a deal that values the Australian mining company at around $11.6 billion.
snippet: Rio Tinto and Mitsubishi have raised their offer to acquire all of Coal and Allied to about $131 a share, from $128, in a deal that values the Australian mining company at around $11.6 billion.
lead_paragraph: Rio Tinto and the Mitsubishi Corporation raised their offer to acquire all of Coal and Allied Industries to roughly $131 a share, from $128, in a deal that values Coal and Allied, an Australian mining company, at around $11.6 billion.

headline.main: Rio Tinto and Mitsubishi Raise Bid for Coal and Allied
